title: Poster, "A Documentation Work...Silvermine Guild of Artists", 1972
title_raw: A Documentation Work...Silvermine Guild of Artists
medium: Ofset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted in white lower left: A Documentation of works / and works in progress by students / of the Painting Seminar of / The Silvermine Guild / School of the Arts / April 28 to May 19.
Lower center in white: The Guest Gallery / The Silvermine Guild of Artists / New Canaan Connecticut
description: An exhibition poster featuring the names of painting studenta at the Silvermine Guild, printed in white text on a solid black background. The first names of the artists are in a thinner font white the last names are printed heavier. The names are irregularly clustered in the upper quadrant. At lower center in heavy white block letters: APRIL / 72. Gallery name at lower center.The artists names reading from top of sheet: SALLY / AUBREY  SUSAN COURAGE BLATT / SUE EVANS / BARBARA GRAY / KARIN KLINK / STELLA PETTERSON / MARILOU VOGLER / MARY K. WALKER / CARROL WEBB / MARGART WARE / B.FORD WOIT / IRMA GILGORE / ANN HEATH / LILLIAN LEWIN / JANE SAX

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "A Documentation Work...Silvermine Guild of Artists", 1972. Ofset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-228.
